name: GenreHoppers
description:
An early build of an RPG that switches between two protagonists one in a fantasy world the other a dystopian cyberpunk city. Alternate between action RPG and turn based combat with a variety of attacks from various video game genres.

Controls

W/A/S/D and Arrow keys to move

Mouse/ Left Mouse Click - Shoot

Esc - Exit game

F4 - Toggle Fullscreen
